de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.construction.conversion

Class IFCToOWLConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cib.bimsage.ontology.construction.conversion.IFCToOWLConverter

  • public class IFCToOWLConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates an OWL ontology from a given IFC model Utilizes the IFCToLBD Converter: https://github.com/jyrkioraskari/IFCtoLBD for generating an initial ontology LBD ontology is modified based on given annotations

        Converts a given IFC Model to an OWL ontology and integrates it in the current Converter ontology
